WorkflowInfo.Name: Response actions menu
WorkflowInfo.Description: Manage events remotely using response actions menu
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process escalates an incident, waits for one of 3 responses (CPU, Memory or Disk), and continues the activities according to the reply. You can use this process as a part of another workflow when handling an incident.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:AdvancedCommunicate;Assembly=AdvancedCommunicate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:CPU;Assembly=CPU, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:Memory;Assembly=Memory, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:DiskSpace;Assembly=DiskSpace, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:AdvancedCommunicate IsValid="True" x:Name="advancedCommunicate1" SingleTemplateName="" NotifyAll="0" SingleBody="to check CPU reply: cpu
to check memory usage reply: memory
to check disk space reply: disk" SingleSubject="Response action menu" DisplayName="Advanced Communicate" SingleMessage="1" SingleTemplateNumber="-1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Find a entity that will take responsibility" TypeName="AdvancedCommunicate" SerializedData="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="SerializedData" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="SerializedData">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="UserType" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Number" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="CommunicationMethods" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="TimeFrameName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="TimeFrameNumber" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="WaitReply" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Show" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Escalate" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="OneByOne" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Level" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Recovery" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="MessageType" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Subject" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Body" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="TemplateName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="TemplateNumber" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="isEnabled" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <SerializedData>
 <UserType>User</UserType>
 <Name>Admin</Name>
 <Number>1</Number>
 <CommunicationMethods>Email</CommunicationMethods>
 <TimeFrameName>Always</TimeFrameName>
 <TimeFrameNumber>0</TimeFrameNumber>
 <WaitReply>00:10:00</WaitReply>
 <Show>True</Show>
 <Escalate>True</Escalate>
 <OneByOne>False</OneByOne>
 <Level>1</Level>
 <Recovery>True</Recovery>
 <MessageType>Custom</MessageType>
 <Subject>Response action menu</Subject>
 <Body>to check CPU reply: cpu
to check memory usage reply: memory
to check disk space reply: disk</Body>
 <TemplateName />
 <TemplateNumber>-1</TemplateNumber>
 <isEnabled>1</isEnabled>
 </SerializedData>
</NewDataSet>" SingleType="Custom" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="CPU"><ns1:ReturnValue Value="cpu" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","cpu")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity."
